bookSourceComment:
阅读云（sososhu）搜索系列又增加一个
by天天的鸟蛋蛋：矫正测试
我不是这书源 原作
只是修复搜索和目录页,正文页

ruleSearch.author: span@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (result.match(/阅读云/)) {
u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
cookie.removeCookie(u)
// java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
ck = cookie.getCookie(u)
head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
url = u + "," + head
result = java.ajax(url)
}
result
</js>
.block > div > div:nth-child(n+1)
ruleSearch.name: a@text

searchUrl: https://www.sososhu.com/?site=wapsywbook&q={{key}},{headers:{ "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; PACM00 Build/QP1A.190711.020) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.5359.79 Mobile Safari/537.36" }}
